medical_history.chief_complaint: Ocular pain and visual loss in the right eye.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 days prior to examination. The patient has a history of bilateral anterior uveitis since age 6. His mother noted swelling of his wrists and ankles at the same time as the ocular problems.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of bilateral anterior uveitis since age 6; swelling of wrists and ankles.
medical_history.family_history: Sister had posterior synechia and camptodactyly; father had phthisical eyes due to granulomatous uveitis and secondary glaucoma, and also had camptodactyly.
